text: Romaine Gustave Solbert (September 7, 1925 â€“ June 9, 2022) was an American artist, photographer, and author. She was known as an illustrator of books. Her best known work was The Pushcart War. She illustrated books with her partner Jean Merrill. Solbert died in Randolph, Vermont, on June 9, 2022, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American illustrators Category:American photographers Category:Writers from Washington, D.C. title: Ronni Solbert
